changeSet.author: system
changeSet.comment: Migrate and aggregate data from KPI_B2_DETAIL_RESULT_OLD to new KPI_B2_DETAIL_RESULT, ignoring station/method columns and using MIN(TE_OUTCOME)
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO KPI_B2_DETAIL_RESULT ( CO_ID, CO_INSTANCE_ID, CO_INSTANCE_MODULE_ID, DT_ANALISYS_DATE, TE_EVALUATION_TYPE, DT_EVALUATION_START_DATE, DT_EVALUATION_END_DATE, CO_TOT_REQ, CO_AVG_TIME, CO_OVER_TIME_LIMIT, TE_OUTCOME, CO_KPI_B2_RESULT_ID ) SELECT MIN(CO_ID), CO_INSTANCE_ID, CO_INSTANCE_MODULE_ID, DT_ANALISYS_DATE, TE_EVALUATION_TYPE, DT_EVALUATION_START_DATE, DT_EVALUATION_END_DATE, SUM(CO_TOT_REQ) AS CO_TOT_REQ, SUM(CO_TOT_REQ * avg) / SUM(requests) AS CO_AVG_TIME, SUM(CO_OVER_TIME_LIMIT) AS CO_OVER_TIME_LIMIT MIN(TE_OUTCOME) AS TE_OUTCOME, CO_KPI_B2_RESULT_ID FROM KPI_B2_DETAIL_RESULT_OLD GROUP BY CO_INSTANCE_ID, CO_INSTANCE_MODULE_ID, DT_ANALISYS_DATE, TE_EVALUATION_TYPE, DT_EVALUATION_START_DATE, DT_EVALUATION_END_DATE, CO_KPI_B2_RESULT_ID;

changeSet.author: system
changeSet.comment: Set the foreign key in kpi_B2_analytic_data to the correct value from kpi_B2_detail_result for each matching row
changeSet.sql: UPDATE kpi_B2_analytic_data a SET co_kpi_B2_detail_result_id = d.co_id FROM kpi_B2_detail_result d WHERE a.dt_analisys_date = d.dt_analisys_date AND a.co_instance_id = d.co_instance_id AND a.co_instance_module_id = d.co_instance_module_id AND a.dt_evaluation_date BETWEEN d.dt_evaluation_start_date AND d.dt_evaluation_end_date AND d.te_evaluation_type = 'MESE';
changeSet.rollback: -- No rollback: deleted data cannot be restored automatically
